title: $4000-3/2.5 Hollywood House-2 Car Garage-Spa-Pool-Gym-Near TY Park-Pet
neighborhood: Hollywood - West of I-95 - Emerald Pointe
posting_body: ['Beautiful big house 3 bed / 2.5 bath with 2 car garage!', "Emerald Pointe's L'Etoile.", 'The floorplan features a ground floor Master Suite and living room both with massive volume ceilings.', 'A half bath and laundry room are just off the front entry.', 'The open staircase leads to the second floor with two bedrooms and a large open loft that can be used as an office.', 'Kitchen is open with a dining area and bay window.', 'The community pool and gym are just a short walk away.', "However, the best feature of this property is it's location.", 'It is central to everything one would need.', 'Shopping, markets, FLL airport, beaches, TY Park, tri-rail, and expressways (I-95, I-595, Turnpike) are all within a 5-15 minute drive.', 'Pet ok with Landlord Approval.', 'THIS IS A YEARLY LEASE.', 'Landlord requires First Month, Last Month and Security Deposit to move in (3 month’s rent).', ' Acceptable credit score/report for all persons on the lease (650+), background check and PROOF of income showing sustained combined incomes at least 3 times the amount of the monthly rent.', 'Must have no judgments or money owed to previous landlords.', 'Dianne Warren,', 'show contact info', ', Beachfront Realty.', ' Map view is approximate, not exact, for security reasons.', 'Please CALL to view this property.', ' No texts or emails for first contact.', ' Private owner property.']
